body:
![Push IO®](http://push.io/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/pushio_logo.png)

## Downloads + Documentation

### iOS
* [Integration Guide](http://docs.push.io/PushIOManager_iOS/)  
* [PushIOManager SDK ](https://github.com/pushio/PushIOManager_iOS/)  
* [Companion App](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/push-io-mobile-dashboard/id547681215?mt=8)  

### Windows Phone
* [Integration Guide](http://docs.push.io/PushIOManager_WP/)  
* [PushIOManager SDK](https://github.com/pushio/PushIOManager_WP/)  

### Android
* [Integration Guide](http://docs.push.io/PushIOManager_Android/)  
* [PushIOManager SDK](https://github.com/pushio/PushIOManager_Android/)  
* [Companion App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pushio.dashboard)  

### API
* [Plugins, Scripts, Helpers](https://github.com/pushio/PushIO_API)
* [Integration Guide](http://docs.push.io/PushIO_API/)

## Other Resources
* [Sign In / Sign Up] (https://manage.push.io)    
* [Zendesk Support] (http://pushio.zendesk.com)  
* [System Status] (http://status.push.io)
* [Home Page] (http://www.push.io)

## IRC Channel
* #pushio on irc.freenode.net

## Contact
* Support: [support@push.io] (mailto:support@push.io?subject=Push IO support inquiry)  
* Sales/Billing: [sales@push.io] (mailto:sales@push.io?subject=Push IO sales inquiry)  
* Telephone: 1-888-PUSHIO-1

Copyright © 2009 - 2012 Push IO LLC. All Rights Reserved.  
Push IO® is a registered trademark in the United States. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
